caption.p: Relation between SST/HC and Nino3.4 index. Lead-lag correlation maps of ( a) SST and ( b) HC anomalies in JAS(0) based on the Niño3.4 index in D(1)JF(2), indicating 17-month lead-lag, are shown. The WHWP region is indicated by the black box in ( a). Contour intervals are 0.2, and hatching indicates 95% confidence level by two-tailed t-test.
